website_summaries.verdict: This safe, easy-to-use mirror comes with everything you need when on the road with your baby.
pros: This mirror is shatter proof and has passed a crash test at 44 MPH
Is designed to install onto your car seat in under 30 seconds
360-degree pivoting head allows you to pick the best angle for you and baby
Cozy Greens donates a huge portions of its profits to charities that help babies and mothers
cons: This item is the most expensive car seat mirror on our list

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy-poor quality straps and fell on my baby!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car mirror from amazon in the beginning of March this year for my newborn baby. Today, not even 5 months later, both of the straps broke and the mirror fell and hit my baby's shoulder (thankfully not her face). I don't work now and drive a couple miles every other day, so I am not sure what the hell happened to the product. The straps look like they are literally falling apart when I press on them, VERY bad quality! I have never seen anything like this before. I decided to buy this product because of great amazon reviews, and thankfully my baby is okay.
customer_reviews.author: irina

customer_reviews.title: You can attach this style of mirror without a headrest with safety pins
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it seems pretty durable and the mirrors are definetly high quality and have a bend to them so as to not ever shatter if hit hard. I don't have a head rest on my babies seat (captains chair type) so I ended up using safety pins to affix the straps onto the chair which is easier than it sounds. My baby hasn't figured it out yet but I'm sure she will soon and we can stare at each other at stop signs or such. The suction on the smaller mirror worked like a charm, super easy to put onto the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Benton

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Times a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd baby mirror we purchased (we returned the first 2, because we were not happy with the product). It is wonderful! It was preassembled and fit perfectly over the middle headrest of our 2014 Toyota Corolla. It looks like it will work to move to the side seat when we upgrade car seats. It has a tilt feature and it is very secure- we've seem no movement of the mirror while driving. It has given me peace of mind that I can see my daughter while driving (she hates car rides and cries often). It also comes with a cleaning cloth and a lifetime warranty. I'd recommend this mirror- easy to install, secure and large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stains the headrest...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mirror a couple of years ago when our son was born. The mirror works well. We did scratch it early on, but that was due to putting it in the trunk and not protecting it adequately. The mirror is easy to attach to the headrest and the pivot adjustment is stable and stays in place. However, I recently removed the mirror and found that it has stained the headrest. Our car is a Honda Accord with beige leather seats. The headrest now has dark stains in the shape of the black nylon straps that attach the mirror to the headrest. While the mirror functions as intended, I find that staining the seat is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking but does not capture as big of an area as competitor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror after receiving the highly-rated (but more expensive) mirror from Kay and Kay Online. This one was a bit smaller (desirable in my smaller car). In person, this is a good-looking mirror - I like the matte charcoal plastic frame - it doesn't look cheap like many plastic products. Unfortunately, this mirror did not reflect as big of an area of the baby car seat as the competitor product. It just doesn't set back the reflection far enough to capture as much vertical area as the other. So I am sending this one back and keeping the other.
customer_reviews.author: Dannilion

customer_reviews.title: They have integrity & will take care of you!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this twice. Within months, both of them just slump down and we can't see baby. Do not waste your money!!!! UPDATE! They contacted me asap when I emailed them and refunded my money and sent me new mirrors that they have recently upgraded and fixed! Very pleased with their customer service and integrity. Will continue to purchase from them and recommend them. Thank you Cozy Green for caring for your casters and taking good care of them!
customer_reviews.author: C.Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had no problems with this mirror. I had read reviews about the mirror not staying in place, I've had to travel on very bumpy roads daily and the only time that mirror moves is when someone touches it. I can see baby clearly once it is set so baby is reflecting in or near the centre of the mirror. I love that i can rotate thia mirror in every direction. Very good mirror. Haven't had a chance to use the smaller mirror yet so can't rate the suction. But I really am a happy mom being able to see what LO is up to. And he loves his mirror too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large mirror is great..
customer_reviews.text: Large mirror is great...small free mirror that I really needed and the entire reason I bought this mirror is horrible! Very distorted and can't look at baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 other mirrors at the store and after the first one malfunctioned I ordered this one just as a quick replacement. I am ordering a second now to replace the other store-bought mirror because this one is WAY better. The mirror attaches super securely and we were able to turn it vertically so that my husband could see our whole baby in his truck. We haven't actually used the second, small mirror meant for your front because the back mirror was plenty big enough for our regular rearviews, but we're hanging onto them in case we can find some other use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Large, perfectly position view of baby!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several car mirrors and this one is hands down my favorite. It’s large, easy to install and stable. You can also rotate it to adjust the angle which means it’s possible to get the perfect positioning for viewing your baby. It also comes with a smaller mirror that I put on the front passenger side visor. This allows me to easily see my baby as a passenger if my husband is driving!
customer_reviews.author: Vervora Moore

customer_reviews.title: Big mirror great! Mini mirror horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I like how big and clear the mirror is. Easy attachment to the headrests and easily tilts to almost what position you want. The only thing I am not satisfied is with the mini mirror that comes along with the big mirror. It is not usable at all. Images are distorted like how a toy mirror would look. You cannot see the baby clearly thru the mirror. Maybe it will work when the baby is forward facing but definitely not functional if using with the baby rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Design need work but okay for price.
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay. It’s nice having something that allows me to see my son, and something is better than nothing, I guess. There are some flaws however. The large mirror is made to sit on a pivoting arm that sits too far out away from the base. This causes the mirror to shake a lot when car is in motion. Makes it very hard to see the baby clearly when driving. Also, the type of mirror that is being used becomes very distorted, almost like a fun house mirror, when the car gets too hot. Makes it had to make out an image so isn’t very useful on really hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the price, see baby perfectly - so clear
customer_reviews.text: honestly i thought this item was overpriced because i know i can go to the local discount name brand store and get a baby car mirror for half the price...so glad i didn't. i had no idea what i was missing with my other kids. this mirror is big, adjusts easily, looks nice and is VERY clear. everytime i want to see my little one i glance back and i see him PERFECTLY. it's worth every penny. regrettably i did accidently drop something kind of heavy and sharp on it (it was unattached at the time, should've been more careful) but strangely it barely effected the mirror. it just had a little mark...so i'd say it's pretty darn durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Stupid New Design...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one in 2018, that one works great and we love it. However, the one we bought recently is a diaster. The plastic looks flimsy and cheap! And the velcro strips design doesn't make any sense... you can never tighten the strip because of that stupid velcro strips. It is dangerous for your baby since there is no way you can install the mirror properly. Please give me back the old version!
customer_reviews.author: Joka

customer_reviews.title: not for Toyota Corolla
customer_reviews.text: I tried this in my 4 door Toyota Corolla sedan & it didn't work. The middle headrest is small & so there was not alot to strap the mirror to. As a result the mirror shook so much that you couldn't see images clearly.I wondered if it would make a kid carsick !. it also kept slipping out of position & tilting/hanging down, so much so that then it was within kicking distance of the kid in the car seat. Fun for the kid, but useless for it's function.
customer_reviews.author: BookshireCrone

customer_reviews.title: Crash-tested, crystal clear and huge!
customer_reviews.text: It's been crash-tested (my primary reason for getting this one), and this mirror is large (a major selling point for me). I love how huge this mirror is! It is super clear, and it doesn't have the wonky distortion that gives you headache from trying to focus on your precious cargo, unlike many of the other mirrors I've had. It has two straps (they criss-cross) that cinch down, nice and snug, on the headrest. If I lean forward in the passenger seat, I can look back and see my little one, crystal clear and with ease. I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Vibrating can be a problem in some vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, helps me keep an eye on my baby in the backseat. But it vibrates when I'm driving my van. During a lengthy car ride, the mirror slowly travels to the side or down, often to the point where I can't see my baby's face anymore. This means I'm always adjusting it. When we tried it in my husband's sedan, it didn't vibrate hardly at all. I wish my van, the main vehicle I need the mirror for, didn't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: The Elegant Redhead

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is the BEST! The reflection is crystal clear and the adjust-ability ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the BEST! The reflection is crystal clear and the adjust-ability is great. I really appreciate that it's appearance is not cutesy - a polished and simple black border. I do hours of research before finally investing in a product; I can say that this mirror makes the cut for me. I'd consider myself a baby-stuff minimalist, and It's honestly in my top 10 baby items. So glad I spent the little extra for this one. You can tell the difference in the quality. And the guarantee also means a lot for me - I really appreciate a company that values satisfaction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror does exactly what it was promised to do. Easy to install and adjust, and makes every trip more enjoyable because you don't have to keep stopping to check on the rear facing baby seats. Also babies can see themselves in the mirror and are fascinated, so it helps entertain them too. Would definitely recommend!! Customer service is great too, fast shipment and packaged very well!! I have now purchased 2 of these and am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one of these to try out and we love it! We will be purchasing another for the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these to try out and we love it! We will be purchasing another for the other side of the back seat (we have twins). The babies love looking at themselves and it makes it easy for the passenger seat parent to reach over and give an “emergency bottle” when a baby gets fussy. You can see your child’s mouth so you don’t have to fumble around with the bottle! This product is a great quality and quite large! It’s about the size of a triscuit box but thinner or course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this car seat mirror
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this car seat mirror. It is large and clear so you can easily see your baby is the back seat and was easy to install and adjust the angle. I liked that it has a matte black frame so it doesn’t look tacky in the back seat, it just blends in and does what it’s meant to do. When I had my second baby I ordered another from Cozy greens now I can see both my kids as I drive. Great company with amazing customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mirror for over a year and a half in both cars for our daughter. It is super clear and not once have I been concerned it will come off the headrest. I had an issue with one of the mirrors and reached out to their customer service team. Even after over a year of ownership, the company stands behind their products and are fixing the issue! I will support this company as long as I can and I plan on purchasing a few more for gifts. Thank you for your wonderful product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I like having this mirror. It allows me to see what the baby is doing in the back seat, in the rear-facing car seat. It was a little hard to get adjusted initially, and doesn’t stay in place all the time, because I had to rig it between the two outer headrests. There is no included way to attach the mirror to the center of the back seat if there is no headrest. But, the safest spot for babies is the center of the back seat. It does the job fine, though. I have had a little bit of an issue with it blocking some of my view through the back window, but it’s not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mimosa

customer_reviews.title: Could not get this to stay tight on my head rest
customer_reviews.text: I did try everything but this just would not stay tight on the head rest. This caused the mirror to constantly vibrate which when you are trying to quickly glance to check on your child without taking your eyes off the road for more then and second can be really hard to do. Returned and got a different brand that works great. The size and clarity of the mirror would have been great if it would just not vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Wide and clear
customer_reviews.text: As a new parent, i always want to make sure that my little one is ok and secured, having this rear seat mirror that is wide angled is big enough to see my baby even when i’m driving making sure she’s doing fine. Reason for the 4 stars is i wish there’s like a little light feature that u can turn on either remotely or not that is not too bright so u can still see even when it’s dark or at night time. Otherwise i love it!
customer_reviews.author: aleiah09

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it! I’m glad I went with this one after looking at 10 different ones here on Amazon. This mirror was bigger than I thought originally. Yes, it does shake a little when you drive, but I think that’s inevitable. Very easy to assemble too. My headrest was on the small side so it took some time to make it tight, but not difficult at all. Will be purchasing a second for our other car!
customer_reviews.author: Cylee

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of those store brand mirrors that quickly broke with me just trying to put it on the headrest. This one, right out of the box was massively sturdy. It is large and clear so when I look back I am able to see my son without issues. He also likes to look at it while i talk to him and it seems to provide him with a secure feeling because he hasn't thrown a fit from not being able to see me (especially during this clingy phase).
customer_reviews.author: Happy101

customer_reviews.title: I believe I received a knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: The item I received looks like it is a knockoff. I purchased one of these mirrors a couple years ago which I still use which I would give 5 stars (Image 1) and the new one I got for our second car is made out of a cheaper plastic material and it doesn't have the Cozy Greens logo on the front (Image 2). Also the box it came in shows the Cozy Greens logo on the mirror (Image 3) I'm trying to figure out if you updated the mirror or not or if I got a knockoff. Please help. Also the original one I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A.k.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was our 2nd car mirror purchase. We live on a diet road and our first buy would constantly drop down with every bump to where I would end up only being able to see my daughters toes. This mirror is amazing and doesn't shift at all! I couldn't hey the small auction mirror to work with the big mirror but it makes a perfect small "look at the baby" mirror for my daughter to play with!
customer_reviews.author: April M.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and it seriously is the best rear view mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: Long story but stay with me lol. I purchased this in March after we brought our son home. It worked great and it seriously is the best rear view mirror I've seen. Clear image and easy placement Within 3 weeks the mirror detached from the base. I emailed their customer service and requested a replacement. They responded the same day and included an apology and details on the shipping of a brand new mirror! They sent it out on a Friday with expedited shipping so I got it on Monday. Very satisfied with their customer service and I will refer all my friends to purchase their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lack

customer_reviews.title: Better than the big box store
customer_reviews.text: Love that it mounts to an arm of the headrest so when our dogs rest their heads on the back of the seat they don't move it around. Headrest straps are much more secure than the mirror we picked up at a big box store (this mirror is larger and clearer too). Secondary mirror is nice to, but all our mounting locations were either movable (visors and sunroof) or blocked the drivers view (windshield and side windows). We have a small suv, so I could see this mirror being extremely useful in a larger vehicle with somewhere to mount it.
customer_reviews.author: JAW

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. I moved my carseat to the center because my car is so small. It gave the seat more room and allowed me to have passengers. When I did this I couldn't use the mirror i had before because there's no headrest and it wouldn't allow me to reposition. Shortly after my daughter had a febrile seizure while I was driving so I immediately ordered this. I love how you can angle it and it gives such a clear view. It gives me some piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: snickerd00dle

customer_reviews.title: Great car mirror for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I am pumped about how this thing attaches to my headrest. The first mirror we had kept falling down or slipping because of how it attached to the seat. This one crosses over the back of the headrest and pulls tight. It also can rotate and move seamlessly because the mirror is attached to the base on a ball joint. I recommend this to any parent :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bates

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Like the large size of mirror & adjustability but it shakes horribly when driving. I ended up rolling a cloth & putting it behind mirror to stop that. I thought i would like the curved mirror to see more but it just makes everything appear further away. Straps also rub bad against leather seats...would prefer if they were padded or had "gripping" on them. The small window mirror - I don't know why but it literally makes me nauseous looking in it. I have made adjustments to both mirrors to fix them but most wouldn't be able to. Overall not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheap clasps, assuming those work it's as good as you want.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is that one of the two plastic clasps isn't strong enough to hold itself shut if you tighten the strap at all. Given that the other clasp works, I assume this won't happen to everyone. It's a shame because the size of the mirror is perfect (not too small and not to big to block viewing out the back window) and the hinge makes adjusting the view really easy. Update to 4 stars: The manufacturer read this review, and immediately shipped a replacement, it's nice to see customer service that is so responsive and attentive to Amazon reviews!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward, solid fastening
customer_reviews.text: After constantly having to fiddle with the, I wanted a mirror that had simple buckles and straps along a horizontal and vertical axis. This mirror fit the bill and installed snugly in about a minute. The mirror is mounted on a ball head that can be tightened down for fine adjustment and can even be rotated to portrait orientation if you want to see what baby's hands are doing. In hindsight, I should have just gotten this mirror first, despite it being a little more expensive, rather than having to make a mistake purchase with the Brica mirror first.
customer_reviews.author: G. Herzberg

customer_reviews.title: Very clear, sturdy mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is very clear. Nothing looks distorted like a fun house mirror like a lot of the other mirrors on the market. Once placed on my headrest and tightened into the correct angle, this mirror has not moved since. I am so happy that I am not constantly adjust it back to its needed position. I purchased this mirror because I heard that it is the only one that could hold up to the Arizona heat, we will see how it does after 1 summer here. My baby loves to look at herself. I think it makes her feel like she has a friend back there with her. I swear she can see me in the mirror too.
customer_reviews.author: funny girl

customer_reviews.title: Great! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've really been happy with this mirror. We initially had another one that didn't pivot, but the lack of versatility was a problem. Our old one also came with a remote. It was supposed to light up and play music, but we could never even get those features to work. I'm also enjoying that this one is not getting scratched up like our old one. It's nice to have found a winner :-)
customer_reviews.author: Claire J

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service but poor product
customer_reviews.text: I would have originally gave one star but customer service is great so I believe that alone deserves another star. My first mirror broke after a few months of using with my son and I contacted the company and they sent out a replacement immediately, but recently the replacement broke exactly how the original did. The straps do NOT hold well. This mirror almost fell directly on my newborn daughter. Even though it’s supposed to be lifetime guaranteed I’m not sure there’s a point in getting a replacement mirror again if the product continues to break the same way.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but can't stop the rattling!
customer_reviews.text: Update Review: Cozy Greens reached out and sent us a brand new mirror since the one originally sent seemed to be defective. So far so good with the new mirror. No rattling!! Updating to 4 stars. Recently purchased this baby car mirror. It was easy to set up and didn't have a problem for the first week of use. However, after a week I started to hear it rattling even on smooth roads. Unfortunately after trying to adjust it multiple times, it will be returned for a different mirror. Bummed because it is so highly rated but maybe this one was defective?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DeLena

customer_reviews.title: Warped mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I didn’t have to adjust my rear view mirror in order to see baby but the smaller windshield mirror is like warped. It’s so bad I sincerely believed my vision was going crazy when I put it up on the windshield and freaked out. Luckily, the larger mirror is fine but I could’ve gotten a cheaper mirror for just the large one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror. Front mirror is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The backseat mirror connects easily and quickly to the headrest in the backseat of my car. The mirror has to be tilted slightly in order for me to see my baby. I’m not sure if this is how all of these mirrors are, but I don’t mind the tilt because I can see him. I don’t use the front mirror, as it fell off a bunch of times. I can see my baby using my rear view mirror when the mirror on the back is titled, which is why I gave it only 4 stars. The mirror is nicely made though, there is no distortion in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: XFitLauren

customer_reviews.title: Big mirror, poor strap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and it’s huge, I can practicly see the whole car seat. But if the road is a little bit bumpier it shakes a little. Update 10 months later: I had to move the mirror to the other seat, as I moved my baby’s car seat. When I pulled the strap to make it steadier, it broke. Now I’m gonna use only one of them, let’s hope that it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mimassi Pedroso

customer_reviews.title: Was incomplete- missing first aid kit and  little mirror is nonfunctional
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with first aid kit. Also the little mirror that attaches to the windshield is like a fun house mirror. So difficult to see anything out of. I bought 2 sets of these mirrors based on the ratings and am So disappointed. I’m wondering if I get a different secondary mirror if I can make this work.
customer_reviews.author: aball38

customer_reviews.title: Works alright, hard to tighten and jiggles sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the best luck with these mirrors. Had a different product originally, which literally fell apart at the seams after only 6 months. Bought this as a replacement due to high ratings and reviews. Hard to tighten this mirror properly on the headrest sometimes. Vibrates and shakes with the car's movement, making it quite the distraction and annoyance to the baby and me. Had to tighten numerous times, and think I finally have it secured properly. Still not the largest mirror, and it has to be positioned just right to be able to see baby in back seat. It's fine, does the job. Not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works well, does not come with "extras"
customer_reviews.text: The mirror works as expected. This is one of the more expensive baby mirrors, but I chose it because many reviews mentioned you get extras like first aid kits making it a good value. It seems like they have stopped including these extras. Given that there is no added value there, I suspect you can get a mirrors that work just as well for cheaper than this, so this probably is not the best value out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Mirror joint loosens constantly
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and way that this product attaches to my car. However, after weeks of use I find it is rendered useless because the joint the mirror is on loosens far too easily. so the start of my car trip I will tighten it up completely and minutes in it has fallen down and I'm looking at my child's feet... I shouldn't have to tighten it before every car ride to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big mirror, terrible little mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love the large mirror. It was very easy to install and fit over the back head rest of my SUV. The clarity of the mirror is good too. I like how light weight the mirror is. The mirror stays in position too. I took off a star because the little mirror for the diver to use is terrible. The image is incredibly distorted! It is not even usable. The quality of the big mirror, the most important mirror (over the headrest) is great.
customer_reviews.author: William Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Practical but needs regular tightening
customer_reviews.text: The mirror portion of this works fine. The glass is curved which allows for wider viewing angles. The one downside is that every couple of weeks I have to retighten the mirror to the base. The screw assembly that holds the two together seems to loosen with time. To me this is not an isolated incident since we have 2, one in my car and another in my wife’s, and they’re both doing it.
customer_reviews.author: == true;

customer_reviews.title: Moves around
customer_reviews.text: The mirror moves around a lot, and is basically useless unless there is someone in the back seat to constantly adjust it every time I hit a bump, or even just normal freeway driving. I tried adjusting the straps and tightening it where ever possible, but it doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Smoky Blue

customer_reviews.title: Locks in Place
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is much more clear than others I've purchased. Some back seat mirrors are convex making the view skewed, or are made of that weird plastic material that does not provide a very good reflective surface. I love that this one has a lock feature. You twist the lock in place and your child can not move the mirror out of place. This was a real problem with our previous mirror. I would accidentally hit it getting our daughter in and out of the car. This one doesn't move. LOVE IT. We bought another one for my husbands car to replace his previous one as well.
customer_reviews.author: LTrip

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product. Easy install and great packaging. Fits my 2017 Toyota Rav 4 like a charm. This is definitely high quality. The mirror looks great and comes with a cleaning cloth. The first aid kit is a great bonus to keep in the care. Cozy also comes with a lifetime guarantee which is unbeatable. I purchased another car seat for a few dollars less and the strap broke off.. but this one definitely seems sturdier. Will update after a few months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Raj D

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: As such a worrier, I wanted a mirror so I could just turn around and see my baby instead of craning around his carseat to make sure he was ok and happy. After doing my research, I picked this one and I LOVE it! It is super easy to install and lock in. Every now and then I have to readjust the mirror as it moves when bumped, but it's not often enough to be a bother. It is a great size and such a relief for me! I drive a dodge pickup and I have the tilted headrests in the back. I have not had any problems with this moving unless bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Mikala Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install, stays on and has very wide range. We had a Brica Baby which was terrible, it would always move so I was skeptical about trying another product but this one is worth the money and works as it’s supposed to. We used it in a rental and in our own car.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wide and stable back seat mirror
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mirror based on reviews here. I was looking for a wide enough stable back seat mirror to be able to watch my baby behind my seat. Just received it today and placed it in the car. So far I’m very satisfied with the product. I can clearly see my child during driving without having to turn my head or move aside in order to see her better. It stays in place and gets a full view of the car seat (wide frame). The material seems very good in quality, so I hope it lasts long too.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: What a great parent product!
customer_reviews.text: After comparing multiple backseat mirrors, I'm more than satisfied with my purchase of the Cozy Greens Baby Car Mirror! This product was easy to install, and the quality is second to none. I would recommend this product to any parent who is trying to decide between various products like I was. You'll be surprised with how simple it is too install, and even better how easy it is to keep a safe eye on your child.
customer_reviews.author: tallguy_tyler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- doesn’t work if it’s hot
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. I installed the mirrors before a quick trip to visit family. It worked great on the way there. My car was parked outside in 90 degree heat and both mirrors are all messed up. You can’t really see clearly. Also the picture showed it came with a first aide kit- but that did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mirror is adjustable so that I can position it just right, however it does loosen and can be easily bumped out of place. I have purchased 2 - originally for my daughter who was born Oct. 2016 and again for my son who was born June 2018. Unfortunately, my daughter’s broke soon after purchasing my son’s. So far, my son’s is still working well. I considered purchasing a third, but recent reviews similar to my situation made me shy away and we decided to just go without a mirror facing her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Shakes a lot
customer_reviews.text: The plus sides are that the mirror is large and easy to install. However, the mirror shakes immensely. We have a different brand that is similar in size and structure and have never had a problem with it shaking. Not sure what might be causing the shaking for the CozyGreen one. They do offer an insurance pack (product replacement, coupon, etc.) if you register within 14 days. I hadn't opened the box within 14 days let alone install and get a feel for its performance, particularly since we weren’t driving around much in the car it was installed in. I went ahead and signed up for it recently. I will update if/when I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it's not elastic, so you don't worry about it stretching out and falling. Somehow one day I knocked it putting my baby in his seat and it was crooked but a mile down the road something about the vibration must have helped it right itself. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J. Mays

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% happy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I’m supposed to have to tighten the mirror every day but that is what I have to do multiple times a day. It loosens and tilts down so that I can’t see my baby. It was easy to assemble. It was nice that I could attach it easily to my head rest and see my baby while it remains tight and does not tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.  Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this mirror in 2016 with the birth of my first child. It held up pretty well over the past 2+ years but the locking mechanism stopped working earlier this year. I emailed customer service and they informed me that they have a new updated mirror design and sent me a brand new mirror with the updated design free of cost. I'm happy to say that they honor their 100% lifetime satisfaction guarantee. With that being said, stop wasting any more time and feel comfortable that you're purchasing a great product with great customer service to support it.
customer_reviews.author: P. T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirror, very large
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is great. I had another mirror that was smaller and hard to use, and I have none of those complaints about this one. The size is great, and makes it easy to see a child in the rear seat. I ended up buying a second for our other car to replace the other one.
customer_reviews.author: qbc1899

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Price was great, Install was a breeze, and Size is perfect!!! Don't know why I didn't get this with my other two! Love that it is so wide and mirror doesn't have a glare. It is also adjustable so I can point it in various directions which is perfect so when my husband and I drive we can easily assist since we are two dramatically different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy install
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is huge! Perfect for my car. Ordering another one for our second vehicle too. Easy to install just 2 buckles and then you can adjust them like a backpack strap
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror & great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror and fantastic customer service. We purchased two of these mirrors in the last year for two cars. One of them suddenly broke - the strap just kind of...tore. Possibly from being in the sun? No idea. But I reached out to Cozy Greens to see if they would replace it, and they responded so quickly asking for an address to send the updated model. So glad they made everything so painless. & it really is a great mirror! Makes it so easy to see my daughter in the back and she loves being able to see herself too.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Shakes a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this given all the great reviews. Easy to install for sure. I strapped it on and was able to get it very tight around the headrest. I noticed throughout the day that the image was very shaky no matter the road. I did notice before installation that when you lightly press the corners of the mirror, it was not firmly attached to the plastic rim. Not sure if this is why the image shakes so much. I realize that some shaking is inevitable, but it shakes to the point that I can't really see my baby (and this is even on smooth roads)
customer_reviews.author: Maya K.

customer_reviews.title: this is the best. The two straps allow for a snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Of the three mirrors I've used, this is the best. The two straps allow for a snug fit. In the past hitting a bump in the road would cause the mirrors I had to move and I'd lose my sight of the baby. Haven't had that problem with this one It does stick out a bit more from the headrest than other styles, and so I do sometimes bump into it and need to readjust it, but once adjusted, it stays true. I'm still looking for a mirror that can readily attach to the fixed headrest in our 2010 Jeep Patriot, so if anybody has any ideas, please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: WordsofJoi

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install!
customer_reviews.text: I almost asked my husband to "install" this for me when it arrived but when I took it out of the package it was obvious that wouldn't be necessary. So stinking easy! The adjustable straps glide easily and there's no need to adjust, adjust, adjust. I have a smaller car so I loved that I could easily turn the mirror vertically and get the view I was looking for. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: V. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Green 360 adjustable mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror for a few reasons. First, it was very easy to install, very straightforward and so far has installed in all 3 of our cars with no problems at all. Second, I really like that it is adjustable (rotates) so it works for me to see my baby but it's nice for him to look at himself too. I guess he thinks he's as cute as we think he is :) Third, it is very big which is great for me and him. Fourth, it is a nice clear mirror. None of that "fun house" mirror look at all. Lastly, it's a great price for how nice it is. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pennijo

customer_reviews.title: I love having the mirror so I can see my son ...
customer_reviews.text: I love having the mirror so I can see my son and make sure he is ok. The only draw back is when I put it on the head rest and made sure to follow the installation instructions, as well as tighten the straps, making sure the adjustment was tight too - the mirror kept moving down while I would drive and not stay in the position I put it in. So my husband went to adjust it and ended up putting the mirror upside down so that it would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror - the dual strap allowed me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror - the dual strap allowed me to put it on the headrest next to the car seat and angle it without fear of it falling off. Now my husband doesn't bump into it when putting our son in his car seat, my son can't kick it, and we can still see him in the rearview mirror. The dual strap keeps it in place, and the mirror itself is well-made. Definitely happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Malleybean

customer_reviews.title: Moves too easily
customer_reviews.text: Update: We still use these mirrors a year and a half later, but the fact that you cannot tighten the mirror and have it actually stay in place is frustrating. That is the one negative on this mirror. Even if we don’t nudge it, the mirror still moves while we’re driving to where we can’t see our child. We really like the mirrors. They fit on all sizes of headrests and you can adjust them any direction. The only negative is that you can't tighten them in place enough, so they move easily with any nudge. We end up hitting ours with the car seat a lot, so we are constantly readjusting them.
customer_reviews.author: aaa0712

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror, does vibrate
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this mirror. The angle was much better than my previous velcro-secured mirror. My only slight complaint was that it does vibrate a significant amount more but it's large enough to still have a clear picture and unless you're staring at your baby while driving then the vibration shouldn't be that much of a negative. I would recommend this to someone and would buy it again. It also has a lifetime warranty which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best One On The Market!
customer_reviews.text: We had another mirror before that I did not like and paid much more for. I was shocked to see how clear this mirror is! The tilt feature is amazing as well. Love actually being able to see my son clearly. Would buy over and over, and recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Issues staying in place
customer_reviews.text: Update: after leaving this review, I was contacted by the seller who is sending me a new mirror to replace the faulty one I have now. The customer service is great and I am excited and willing to give an update after receiving and using the new mirror for a while. I love the idea of a mirror so I can keep an eye on my newborn, but despite constantly tightening it, the mirror keeps shifting around on the back seat. I can never see my son in it so its pretty much been useless to me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Creed

customer_reviews.title: Product Change?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these a few short years ago and loved them, so decided to purchase more for our second child. It seems as if the product design changed since then, and unfortunately not for the better. It is larger, but seems flimsier and we could not a good fit on the headrest. We will be sending back. We also received free front facing mirrors with our initial purchases, but this time there were no added bonuses for the same price. Wish we could still buy the old model!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! I compared multiple mirrors before confidently purchasing this one. Most mirrors I came across before this one were much smaller and blurry. This mirror is great. Large so I can perfectly see my baby, and very clear so I can see him WELL. As a first time momma I’m checking on my little guy constantly and this mirror has me feeling 200% less stressed while driving with my newborn in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: One of the best mirrors of this type
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mirror to my daughter who has two small children and she was very impressed, telling me it's one of the best mirrors of this type that she's ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Higinbotham

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase again at this price point. I have a Subaru Outback and have the car seat in the middle seat with the mirror on the headrest. Install took longer only because we kept trying to get it to line up with the smaller mirror for the front window. No matter how we tried, the vision between the two is distorted and dizzying. Neither me nor my husband can use the smaller mirror. We just use our car rearview mirror. So, it works, mostly. Not probably wouldn't pay $30 again to not be able to use that extra feature.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to install. Though I wouldn't recommend this for those who don't have removable headrests. It just doesn't seem to be a way to install it without one. As far as installing it, simply snap the clips in place over and around the headrest and you're done. I've driven over bumpy brick roads and it doesn't move or need to be readjusted. Small pressure from your hands will move it easy enough though. For me, I feel the the view from my rear view to this mirror gave me a "wide" lense view of my baby. Also sort of made my daughter look tinier coz it seemed further away than it really was.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Keeps rattling, and I wish I read previous reviews before purchasing. Mirror will not stay in place and keeps rattling. I adjusted the mirror multiple times and by the end of my 30 minute drive the mirror is no longer in place.
customer_reviews.author: N b

customer_reviews.title: I can see my grandson!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this mirror so I can see my 1 yo grandson in the car. In the past, his parents had been very skeptical about getting a mirror like this. They not only approved of mine but were ok with me getting one for each of them. Love the mirror! Super easy to install. Super easy to now be able to see my grandson. I’m thrilled I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and install
customer_reviews.text: I was very frustrated with other products. This was absolutely what I was looking for. So easy to install, does NOT need to be on a center seat (my car doesn’t have one). It also came with a free smaller mirror. “Stuck” that one in my husband’s car.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Worth the view!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than other mirrors viewed, this is a wonderful way to watch my precious 11 month old grandson as he sits facing the rear. What is even more wonderful is that he sees me and waves back! Very easy to set up and although I find myself adjusting it every time I put him in the car seat I figure a few second of adjustment is worth the security of knowing and seeing that my grandson is safe. I have even offered to get this mirror for his parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kiddoo

customer_reviews.title: Remains still while driving.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on headrest in either outer or middle rear seat. Does not bounce or move while driving and keeps the mirror still. It's easy to move and change positions and you just adjust the back knob tight when you're satisfied with the position to keep it from moving. Did not shatter in the event of a car crash and lets us not only clearly see our child through the rest view mirror while driving but does not obstruct the rear windshield and was safe to use in our vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad a purchase given all the choices...
customer_reviews.text: Pro/s: - a good size mirror; some sold in stores are too big for me - good attachment system; the two straps and fastex type buckles work well to secure the mirror to the headrest - fairly clear mirror; as clear as you can get with a piece of laminated plastic - wife says it has cute packaging Con/s: - even though the mirror isn't heavy it tends to droop a bit as the vibrations of the road shake it; I might try a fix where I drizzle a bit of glue into the ball/socket joint in the back where the mirror meets the strap-base
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has been great. It has a very clean and clear mirror with very little distortion of picture. The pivioting head on the back of the unit is the best feature because it lets you set the exact spot for perfect viewing. I have tried many mirrors and none have worked as well as this one! Highly reccomend if you are having trouble with mirrors that keep falling out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after one of the first times I drove with my daughter in the car and she cried. I couldn't see what was wrong since she has to be rear-facing and was so worried I pulled over. I purchased this that same day. Now when she cries, I can see that it is just because she is upset and nothing is actually wrong, leaving me to feel more secure. Plus, she enjoys looking at herself in it. I am so glad I purchased this. It reduces my stress in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: After going through multiple mirrors for our toddler and 9 month old that either did not fit the headrest in my equinox or minivan. This posed the issue of not being able to effectively see them. This large mirror has plenty of room for adjustment and is incredibly clear! I was pleasantly surprised with how well this stays adjusted to the correct position over all terrain. I will be purchasing a 2nd one for our other vehicle!!
customer_reviews.author: DAVEnKATE

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I originally registered for a different mirror and received it, but returned it because it was so huge. I then chose Cozy Greens based on Amazon reviews. The mirror is still large and I don't understand why they need to be so big. But, it was easy to instal and adjust. I don't love that even though I have a sunshade on the window, this mirror catches light from elsewhere and shines it in my baby's face. I imagine all large mirrors would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Claire

customer_reviews.title: Very clear mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent visibility. I can clearly see my baby and appreciate the swivel design. However the top strap is far too long for the headrest of my Honda Pilot and has required a modification to get it secure.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGardener

customer_reviews.title: Great big carseat mirror
customer_reviews.text: We have fixed headrests in our car, however the middle seat in the back is adjustable. This was great because we could pivot the mirror to the side to see the carseat perfectly, while being hooked to the middle headrest. We had a different mirror and it just never stayed in place. With the locking mechanism this one stays perfectly in place all the time. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: M1chelle8

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car mirror. It is easy to install, so if you have to move it to another vehicle it's not a big deal and it gets the job done. I can see my baby and he likes to look at himself in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying! I still highly recommend. I have my second baby on the way and my 16 month old who is still rear faced! My daughter loves looking at herself and playing in the mirror. I had bought a mirror before but it seemed like a fun house mirror and became blotchy overtime. I love how big this mirror is, how clear and easy to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a mirror which can see my baby!
customer_reviews.text: I could not adjust any mirror to see my baby, I was moving my head to see him during the drive which was too dingoes. I kind of gave up using a mirror. But I saw this mirror's review and tried. YES, it works so easily and perfect!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MIRROR! LOVE THIS. I could see my baby were enjoying seeing out of the window and start sleeping etc. It made me so less stress having this mirror and see my baby without struggling to see. Thank you so much for making such a great mirror, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: be a healthy puppy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Buy this mirror, you won’t regret it. This was the third mirror that we purchased trying to get one that would work with our vehicle. The other two mirrors were “fixed” and always aimed way over the car seat. The only way to see baby was to wedge something behind the mirror in order to fix the angle. You won’t have this problem with this mirror. It has a plate that sits flat to the head rest and a swivel base. Spend the money and do it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get straps to stay secure on backseat headrest.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product. Couldn't get the straps to secure tightly in my Subaru Outback headrest. Installed in the middle headrest per instructions, but the swivel never tighten. The mirror would fall downward through the ride. Worse of all is that the ball part of the swivel broke with only a slight bump from another passenger in the back. I did not even get to use it for more than a week, feels like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Enoch Ling

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory. Big design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory but it seems there is a huge design flaw. The screw keeping the mirror stabilize is possible too thin of thread. Constantly having to retighten and adjust. It spins or is pointed in wrong direction by the end of the car ride. Otherwise it's a great mirror and stays on well. I couldn't figure out how to attach it without a headrest.... Which is why I bought this particular one in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fite

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was awful. Everytime you turn the mirror would adjust and you couldn't see the LO. it didn't matter how many times I tightened it. It also flew off the connector piece multiple times. It is stressful enough to drive with LO in the car, but to now worry about the mirror flying off and hitting him is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Brransfo
